full_summary:
**Notice: Request for Information (RFI) for WES System Interim ISS Service Support Contractor**

**Notice Number:** PW- _QT-004-29240
**Revision Number:** 2
**Posting Date:** December 15, 2023
**Closing Date:** February 9, 2024
**Urgent Notice:** No

**Content:**

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites industry entities to provide feedback on the interest and capability of participating in a potential Request for Proposal (RFP) for the interim In-Service Support (ISS) for the Weapon Effects Simulation (WES) System. The proposed contract is expected to be for a period of six years plus eight one-year option periods.

**Project Background:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the continuation of the ISS for the WES System. The ISS Contractor will be responsible for warehouse operations, site management, WES Equipment level 1 maintenance, kitting and de-kitting of soldiers and vehicles, soldier briefs, and exercise operations support.

**Request for Information:**

PWGSC is seeking industry feedback on the potential interest and capability of participating in a future RFP for the WES System Interim ISS Service Support Contractor. We are sharing the draft RFP and relevant documentation with industry partners to gather input on their level of interest and capability.

**Classification:**

This requirement falls under the Federal Supply Classification JX6910B (Training Aids – Operation & Maintenance) and is subject to the following trade agreements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).

**Security Requirements:**

This opportunity includes security requirements associated with the provision of goods and services. Respondents are expected to be aware of the relevant security requirements and to incorporate them into their submissions.

**Contracting Authority:**

Kathie Eddy, PWGSC Contracting Authority, Defence and Major Projects Sector, Electronics, Simulators and Defence Systems Division QT. Phone: 873-353-9727, Email: kathie.eddy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Important Notes:**

* The RFI is not a call for tender nor an RFP, and no agreement or contract will be entered into solely as a result of this RFI.
* Participation in the RFI does not constitute a prerequisite for participation
